casebody.data:
SED Holdings, LLC
v.
3 Star Properties, LLC, et al. 211PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2016 R. Hayes Hofler, III, Attorney at Law, for 3 Star Properties, LLC, et al. Douglas W. Hanna, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Mark R. Sigmon, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for SED Holdings, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of September 2016 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of October 2016."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 22nd day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
